resources.string: Our service is not a medical service. \n\nOur services are second / third opinions based on artificial intelligence algorithms and statistics. We provide diagnostics only of the likelihood of developing diseases based on data on the health status of people with similar parameters.
Our service is not a medical service. \n\nOur services service is not a substitute for professional medical care.if you have or suspect that may you have health problems,please consult your doctor.

Our service is not a medical service. \n\nConsult a specialist for advice. The information provided in this application is for informational purpose only and should not be used for diagnosis or treatment.
Body mass index is a value that allows you to assess the degree of correspondence between a person\'s weight and his height.
The probability of dying in the next 10 yers from cardiovascular diseases.
